name: MLSoundClassifier.DataSource
desc: A representation of a sound-classifier dataset located in the file system or in a data table.

items.name: case labeledDirectories(at: URL)
items.desc: Creates a data source from a folder with subfolders that each contain audio files.

items.name: case labeledFiles(at: URL)
items.desc: Creates a data source from a folder that contains audio files, each named after the sound they represent.

items.name: case filesByLabel([String : [URL]])
items.desc: Creates a data source from a dictionary.

items.name: case features(table: MLDataTable, featureColumn: String, labelColumn: String, parameters: MLSoundClassifier.FeatureExtractionParameters)
items.desc: Creates a data source from a data table of audio features.

items.name: case featuresDataFrame(DataFrame, featureColumn: String, labelColumn: String, parameters: MLSoundClassifier.FeatureExtractionParameters)
items.desc: Creates a data source from a data frame of audio features.

items.name: struct MLSoundClassifier.FeatureExtractionParameters
items.desc: Parameters that affect the process of extracting sound features from audio files.

items.name: func labeledSounds() -> [String : [URL]]
items.desc: Generates a dictionary of the data sourceâ€™s labeled audio files.

items.name: func stratifiedSplit(proportions: [Double], seed: Int) -> [[String : [URL]]]
items.desc: Generates an array of labeled audio dictionaries by splitting the data source into strata.

items.name: func stratifiedSplit<RNG>(proportions: [Double], generator: inout RNG) -> [[String : [URL]]]
items.desc: Generates an array of labeled audio dictionaries by splitting the data source into strata using the random-number generator.
